New Records: Chris Jordan took a hat-trick in the match.
Key Match Events: Chris Jordan took 4 wickets for 10 runs.
England chased down the target of 115 in 9.4 overs.
Adil Rashid was named player of the match.
Post-Match Reflections: USA captain Aaron Jones expressed disappointment and reflected on the team's World Cup debut.
Jos Buttler praised his spin bowlers and reflected on his own batting performance.
Adil Rashid praised Chris Jordan's performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England secured their spot in the World Cup semifinals.
The match was held at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown.
